title: The rule and exercises of holy dying in which are described the means and instruments of preparing our selves and others respectively, for a blessed death, and the remedies against the evils and temptations proper to the state of sicknesse : together with prayers and acts of vertue to be used by sick and dying persons, or by others standing in their attendance : to which are added rules for the visitation of the sick and offices proper for that ministery.
author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for R.R. and are to be sold by Edward Martin, bookseller,
